full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndi TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA BAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI, PHYAG MDZOD PA BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL, TSOG THO TA'I CHING NO YON, SBYIN PA AER KHE NANG SO, BSTAN 'DZIN NOM CHI DGE BSKONGS, 'JAM DBYANGS THONG KA LAG PI LIG THU, BSTAN PA TSE RING HUR TSA PI LEG THU RNAMS KYIS MDZODBTAGS CHE BA, SMAN SNYING YUG MDZOD DGOS SER PO YUG ,BSOD BTAGS LNGA BCAS BSTABS TE KHAL KHA NO YON HO SHU NA'I SBYIN BDAG GRVA RIGS TSANG MA'I NGAG 'DON GYI CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS, PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,)
